isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9800 - HOOD, GRILLE, AND FENDERS - 5000, 9100, 9200, 9300, AND 9400 - REMOVE AND INSTALL - MUD GUARDS

svcsubproc.title: 9200 (Before July 1996) - Remove
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 32for all items in parentheses, unless otherwise stated.

step1.para: Remove the nuts, flat washers and bolts (Item 1) securing the rear mud guard (Item 2) and reinforcement (Item 3) to the mud guard brace (Item 6). Remove the rear mud guard and reinforcement from the mud guard brace, driver side shown.
Repeat this procedure to remove passenger side mud guard.

Position the rear mud guard (Item 2) and reinforcement (Item 3) on the mud guard brace (Item 6) and install the nuts, flat washers and bolts (Item 1) securing the rear mud guard and reinforcement to the mud guard brace, driver side shown.
Repeat this procedure to install passenger side mud guard.

calloutgroup.callout1: 1. BOLT WITH NUT AND FLAT WASHER

svcsubproc.title: 9300 SBA and SFA - Remove
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 33for all items in parentheses unless otherwise stated.

step1.para: Drill out the rivets and washers (Item 3) attaching the front mud guard (Item 1) to the front of the fender (Item 2), driver side shown.

Remove the nuts, flat washers and bolts (Item 8) securing the rear mud guard (Item 5) and reinforcement (Item 6) to the rear of the fender (Item 7). Remove the rear mud guard and reinforcement from the rear of the fender, driver side shown.
Repeat this procedure to remove passenger side mud guard.
Position front mud guard (Item 1) on the front of the fender (Item 2) and install the rivets and washers (Item 3) attaching the front mud guard to the front of the fender, driver side shown.

Position the rear mud guard (Item 5) and reinforcement (Item 6) on the rear of the fender (Item 7) and install the nuts, flat washers and bolts (Item 8) securing the rear mud guard and reinforcement to the rear of the fender, driver side shown.
Repeat this procedure to install passenger side mud guard.

calloutgroup.callout1: 8. BOLT WITH NUT AND FLAT WASHER

svcsubproc.title: 9400 (Before July 1996) - Remove
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 34 for all items in parentheses unless otherwise stated.

step1.para: Remove the nuts, flat washers and bolts (Item 1) securing the rear mud guard (Item 2) and reinforcements (Item 3) to the rear splash panel (Item 4). Remove the rear mud guard and reinforcements from the rear splash panel, driver side shown.
Repeat this procedure to remove passenger side mud guard.

Position the rear mud guard (Item 2) and reinforcements (Item 3) on the rear splash panel (Item 4) and install the nuts, flat washers and bolts (Item 1) securing the rear mud guard and reinforcements to the rear splash panel, driver side shown.
Repeat this procedure to install passenger side mud guard.

svcsubproc.title: 9200 and 9400 (After July 1996) and 9100 (After March 1997) - Remove
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 34 for all items in parentheses unless otherwise stated.

step1.para: Remove the nuts, flat washers and bolts (Item 1) securing the rear mud guard (Item 2) and reinforcement (Item 3) to the fender extension (Item 4). Remove the rear mud guard and reinforcement from the fender extension, driver side shown.
Repeat this procedure to remove passenger side mud guard.

Position the rear mud guard (Item 2) and reinforcement (Item 3) on the fender extension (Item 4) and install the nuts, flat washers and bolts (Item 1) securing the rear mud guard and reinforcement to the fender extension, driver side shown.
Repeat this procedure to install passenger side mud guard.

calloutgroup.callout1: 1. BOLT WITH NUT AND FLAT WASHER
4. REAR SPLASH PANEL OR FENDER EXTENSION

svcsubproc.title: 5000 SFA - Remove
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 35for all items in parentheses, unless otherwise stated.

step1.para: Remove the 2 hex head bolts and lockwashers (Item 7) and remove the mud guard, mud guard bar and mud guard channel assembly (Items 5, 4 and 6) from the mud guard bracket (Item 1), driver side shown.
To disassemble mud guard, mud guard bar and mud guard channel assembly (Items 5, 4 and 6), remove the 3 hex head bolts and lockwashers (Item 8), driver side shown.
Repeat this procedure to remove and disassembly passenger side mud guard.

svcsubproc.title: 5000 SFA - Install
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 35for all items in parentheses, unless otherwise stated.

step1.para: Assemble mud guard bar, mud guard and mud guard channel assembly (Items 4, 5 and 6) and install 3 hex head bolts and lockwashers (Item 8), driver side shown.

To install the mud guard bar, mud guard and mud guard channel assembly (Items 4, 5 and 6), position the assembly in place on the mud guard bracket (Item 1) and install the 2 hex head bolts and lockwashers (Item 7), driver side shown.
Repeat this procedure to assemble and install passenger side mud guard.

svcsubproc.title: 5000 SBA (After August 1994) With Fiberglass Tilt Hood - Remove
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 36 for all items in parentheses, unless otherwise stated.

step1.para: Remove hex head bolts, lockwashers and hex nuts (Item 1) and remove mud guard (Item 2) and mud guard channel (Item 3) from the mud guard mounting bracket (Item 4), driver side shown.
Repeat this procedure to remove passenger side mud guard.

svcsubproc.title: 5000 SBA (After August 1994) With Fiberglass Tilt Hood - Install
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 36 for all items in parentheses, unless otherwise stated.

step1.para: Position the mud guard (Item 2) and mud guard channel (Item 3) on the mud guard mounting bracket (Item 4). Install the hex head bolts, lockwashers and hex nuts (Item 1) to secure the mud guard and mud guard channel to the mud guard mounting bracket, driver side shown.
Repeat this procedure to install passenger side mud guard.

figure.caption: Figure 36. 5000 SBA (With Fiberglass Tilt Hood) Mud Guard

calloutgroup.callout1: 1. HEX HEAD BOLT, LOCKWASHER AND NUT

svcsubproc.title: 5000 SBA (After August 1994) With Optional Butterfly Hood - Remove
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 37for all items in parentheses, unless otherwise stated.

step1.para: Remove 4 hex head bolts (Item 7) and remove the mud guard and mud guard reinforcement (Items 3 and 4) from the mud guard mounting bracket (Item 2), driver side shown.

To remove mud guard mounting bracket (Item 2), remove the hex head bolts, flat washers and hex locknuts (Item 5) that fasten it to the fender panel (Item 1) and to the rear fender support (Item 6), driver side shown.
Repeat this procedure to remove passenger side mud guard and mounting bracket.

svcsubproc.title: 5000 SBA (After August 1994) With Optional Butterfly Hood - Install
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 37for all items in parentheses, unless otherwise stated.

step1.para: Position the mud guard mounting bracket (Item 2) on the fender panel (Item 1) and to the rear fender support (Item 6) and secure it by installing the hex head bolts, flat washers and hex locknuts (Item 5), driver side shown.
To install the mud guard and mud guard reinforcement (Items 3 and 4), position them on the mud guard mounting bracket (Item 2) and secure them with the 4 hex head bolts (Item 7), driver side shown.
Repeat this procedure to install passenger side mud guard and mounting brackets.

calloutgroup.callout1: 5. HEX HEAD BOLT, FLAT WASHER, HEX LOCKNUT
